big deal.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to say that you do not think something is as important as someone else thinks it is
big deal.translation[0].definitions[0].e: It’s just a game. If you lose, big deal.
What’s the big deal? It’s only a birthday, not the end of the world.
It’s no big deal. Everybody forgets things sometimes.
big deal.translation[0].definitions[1].d: an important or exciting event or situation
big deal.translation[0].definitions[1].e: This audition is a big deal for Joey.
